io.netty.handler.ipfilter

接口 IpFilterRule

  • 所有已知实现类:
    IpSubnetFilterRule

    public interface IpFilterRule
    Implement this interface to create new rules.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean matches(InetSocketAddress remoteAddress) 
      IpFilterRuleType ruleType() 

    • 方法详细资料

      • matches

        boolean matches(InetSocketAddress remoteAddress)
        返回:
        This method should return true if remoteAddress is valid according to your criteria. False otherwise.

      • ruleType

        IpFilterRuleType ruleType()
        返回:
        This method should return IpFilterRuleType.ACCEPT if all matches(InetSocketAddress) for which matches(InetSocketAddress) returns true should the accepted. If you want to exclude all of those IP addresses then IpFilterRuleType.REJECT should be returned.
